example.code:
PS C:\> Get-ASScheduledAction -AutoScalingGroupName my-asg
AutoScalingGroupName : my-asg DesiredCapacity : 10 EndTime : MaxSize : MinSize : Recurrence : ScheduledActionARN : arn:aws:autoscaling:us-west-2:123456789012:scheduledUpdateGroupAction:8a4c5f24-6ec6-4306-a2dd-f7 2c3af3a4d6:autoScalingGroupName/my-asg:scheduledActionName/myScheduledAction ScheduledActionName : myScheduledAction StartTime : 11/30/2015 8:00:00 AM Time : 11/30/2015 8:00:00 AM
example.description: This example describes the scheduled scaling actions for the specified Auto Scaling group.
This example describes the specified scheduled scaling actions.
This example describes the scheduled scaling actions that start by the specified time.
This example describes the scheduled scaling actions that end by the specified time.
This example describes the scheduled scaling actions for all your Auto Scaling groups.
